title: First Steps
body: Every empire begins with a single tap. The belt holds infinite ore for those willing to dig.

title: Automation
body: The first module marks the turn from miner to operator. Production never sleeps.

title: Clicker
body: A hundred taps. The rig remembers every one.

title: Expansion
body: Ten modules online. The operation scales.

title: Crew Recruit
body: The first hire. Someone has to watch the rigs.

title: Empire
body: Ten worlds under one banner. The belt has felt your presence.

title: Rebirth
body: Prestige is not loss. It is shedding the old shell so the next run burns brighter.

title: Veteran
body: Five cycles of rebirth. You know the drill.

title: Void Walker
body: Twenty-five cycles of rebirth. You are no longer just crossing the voidâ€”you are of it.

title: First Quest
body: The board posted. You delivered.

title: Quest Master
body: Three quests in a row. The board learns to expect your name.

title: Researcher
body: Five nodes unlocked. The lab opens doors the mine never could.

title: Scientist
body: Ten research nodes. The belt yields more than ore.

title: Meteor Storm
body: When the belt rains ore, rigs work overtime. Veteran miners know to ride the storm.

title: Solar Flare
body: Charged particles from the star boost reactor output. The void gives and takes.

title: Rich Vein
body: A motherlode. For a few minutes, every drill hits paydirt.

title: Dust Storm
body: Visibility drops. Output drops. You ride it out and log the loss.

title: Solar Eclipse
body: The star hides. Production crawls. The belt does not care.

title: Equipment Malfunction
body: Something shorts. You lose a chunk of output before the crew patches it.

title: Comet Tail
body: Ionized gas sweeps the sector. Rigs hum a little louder.

title: Nebula Bloom
body: Dense gas, mild boost. The void breathes.

title: Ion Storm
body: Electromagnetic chaos. Production stutters. You wait it out.

title: Beyond the First World
body: One planet is a foothold. Two is a claim. The expedition logs will remember this day.

title: Third World
body: Another expedition, another name on the map. The fleet grows.

title: Fifth Landing
body: Five worlds. Supply lines stretch. The belt is no longer empty.

title: Multi-World
body: Three planets. The achievement is logged. So is the cost.

title: Rebirth (Prestige)
body: You reset. Coins gone, one planet left. The next run carries a permanent bonus.

title: Fifth Cycle
body: Five prestiges. The percentage stacks. The belt has seen this before.

title: Tenth Cycle
body: Ten rebirths. You are a fixture in the logs.

title: Ascendant
body: Fifteen cycles. The bonus is no longer a trickle.

title: Quest Log: First
body: The first quest completed. The board takes note.

title: Quest Streak
body: Three in a row. Consistency pays. The board pays.

title: Research Log: Five Nodes
body: Five nodes unlocked. Data flows. Modifiers stack.

title: Research Log: Ten Nodes
body: Ten nodes. The lab is no longer a side project.

title: Lead Scientist
body: Fifteen nodes. You are the lab.
